info.noCarsAvailable: We cannot find any cars registered to you.

tooltip.text: A car cannot be recycled if it still has loans, if the car has been reported as stolen or if it has been seiced by the police. Login to see more information at

error.message: We have problem with the connection to the database and cannot show your cars, please try to re-load the page.

confirm.title: Confirm car

subTitles.confirm: Do you want select this car for recycling?

confirm.info: Adding your car for recycling which will allow you to recycle it at any of our connected recycling companies. This is not binding and the car will only be recyled if you hand over the car to a recycling company.

handover.title: Successfully confirmed for recycling
handover.info: The car has been successfully confirmed for recycling and is now ready to be handed over to a recycling company.

subTitles.nextStep: Next step: Handover the car to recycling company

handover.subInfo: Handover the car to any of the recylcing companies below. Some recycling companies offers pick up, see their website or contact them directly for opening hours and details. Once the car has been handed over for recycling you will recive your payment within 2 business days.

cancelModal.title: Cancel the recycling process for this car
cancelModal.info: When you cancel the recycling the car cannot be recycled at the recycling companies until you mark it for recycling again. You can simply redo the process if change your mind.

info.payment: Money will be payed by Fjársýsla ríkisins to your state collector within 2 days of the payment has been initiated. You will find your payment

confirmedBy.fund: Car payment inititated by Fjársýsla ríkisins
